title: RALARM_MODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE RALARM_MODE :
Filter scope of
RALARM
.F_ID input.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: ALL_ALARMS
rows.Comment:
If the Host Controller interface has received an alarm, all
function block outputs are updated. The alarm is
acknowledged.

rows.Name: ALARM_BY_ID
rows.Comment:
Receive an alarm for the slot or subslot the identification
of which is given in F_ID input, all function block outputs
are updated. The alarm is acknowledged

rows.Name: ALARM_BY_SLOT
rows.Comment:
Receive an alarm for the slot the identification of which is
given in F_ID input AND for all of itâs subslots

rows.Name: ALARM_BY_DEVICE
rows.Comment:
Receive an alarm for the device the identification of which
is given in F_ID input AND for all of itâs slots and
subslots
